item_descriptions: Trader: Add 1 trade, or gain 1 Sale effect.
Tinker: Gain 1 Tinker. You can use 1 tradeto exchange 1 pickaxe for 1 key.
Bomb: Open 1 adjacent tile immidiately,even rock. Gain 2 gold if no tiles nearby.
Smugglers: Steal 1 pickaxe, or open1 nearest rock, or gain 1 trade.
Lockpick: Get 1 key, but give 10 goldor 1 pickaxe to opponent.
Cursed key: Gain 1 key. Lose 5 gold,gain 2 Curse.
Crystal mirror: Skip 1 turn, but gain2 magic mirror.
Wish Stone: You can exchange 10 gold for 1 key,open any 1 tile, or add 2 trades.
Megabomb: Open 3 adjanced tiles,or 1 closest tile if no tiles nearby.
Wicked Stone: Steal 10 gold,1 pickaxe or inflict 2 curse on opponent.
Scanner: See the number of keyson surrounding tiles.
effect_descriptions: Curse: Opponent recieve items you findinstead of you.
Magic Mirror: You receive copy of any itemobtained by opponent.
Gold Rush: For each charge, you can open 1 additional tile for 3 gold each. Max 3 stacks per turn can be obtained.
Gold Touch: You can open rocks for 5 gold. Constant effect.
Gold tile give 3 additional gold, but you must skip next turn if open it by hand.
Curse and magic mirror stacks tick down per item interaction, not per turn. Only inventory items affected.
Finished row, column or center buff is given to a player who opens last closed tile
